landing_page.hero: Split layout: Text (Left) + Image/3D (Right). Use 'Bento Grid' for feature highlights below.
landing_page.features: Grid layout: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-8. Cards with large icons and minimal text.

calculators.layout: Two-column grid on desktop (Input Left, Result Right sticky). Single column stack on mobile.
calculators.result_card: Sticky sidebar on desktop. High emphasis on the 'Final Amount'. Use donut charts for breakdown.

dashboard.grid: Bento Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6. 'Total Saved' (col-span-1), 'Recent Calcs' (col-span-2), 'Deadlines' (col-span-1).

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL_DEPENDENCIES: `yarn add framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge recharts react-day-picker date-fns sonner`
THEME_SETUP: Configure `tailwind.config.js` with the provided color palette. Ensure 'primary' uses the hex codes provided.
COMPONENT_OVERRIDE: Do not use default Shadcn styles blindly. Apply `rounded-2xl` to all cards and `rounded-xl` to buttons as per guidelines.
CHARTING: Use `recharts` for the tax breakdown donut chart. Style it minimally with the brand palette.
NAIRA_SYMBOL: Always use 'â‚¦' (U+20A6). Ensure fonts support it (Manrope/Inter do).
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all inputs have associated labels. Use `aria-live` for calculator results updates.
TEST_IDS: Add `data-testid` to all inputs, buttons, and result displays.
NO_EMOJIS: Use Lucide icons instead of emojis.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters where appropriate (e.g., sticky nav).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
